text: Progressive Corporation is an American insurance company. In late 2022, it became the largest motor insurance carrier in the U.S. It was founded in 1937 by Jack Green and Joseph M. Lewis. It is headquartered in Mayfield Village, Ohio. The company insures passenger vehicles, motorcycles, RVs, trailers, boats, PWC, and commercial vehicles. Progressive also provides home, life, pet, and other insurance through select companies. title: Progressive Corporation
